channel.title: Macaroni Linux OS
channel.description: Recent content on Macaroni Linux OS

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started # Prerequisites # Macaroni OS Linux only supports AMD64 at the moment. Get Macaroni OS # To begin playing with Macaroni you have a few options but before we get into the different possibilities, Here is some information about the available releases. Release Description Macaroni Funtoo The core release based on OpenRC/SysVinit Funtoo system. Macaroni Funtoo Systemd A Funtoo SystemD release.
